id: list-assets-by-status-type

description: "Returns the assets that currently use the supplied asset status type identifier. Use this to power dashboards that focus on 'Retired' devices, 'Ready to Deploy' pools, or any custom status labels configured in Incident IQ."
sidebar_label: "List assets by status type"

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List assets by status type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/assetstatustype/{assetStatusTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the assets that currently use the supplied asset status type identifier. Use this to power dashboards that focus on "Retired" devices, "Ready to Deploy" pools, or any custom status labels configured in Incident IQ.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetStatusTypeId** - Inspect any asset returned from [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) and copy `Items[].Status.AssetStatusTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Run [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to locate assets and capture `AssetStatusTypeId` values.
2. (Optional) Validate the metadata with [GET /api/v1.0/assets/status/types/\{assetStatusTypeId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-status-type) to confirm the status scope and whether it retires the device.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/assetstatustype/\{assetStatusTypeId\}](/docs/api/assets/list-assets-by-status-type) to page through matching assets and take follow-up actions.

**Minimal Required Fields**: assetStatusTypeId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetStatusTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset status type to filter by. Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/assets/status/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-status-types) and read `Items[].AssetStatusTypeId`.","example":"83a10b14-c3a9-4f3b-b104-da83276f9101","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listAssetStatusTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/assets/status/types","responseField":"Items[].AssetStatusTypeId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
